text: ELSA Patterns and Relationships
ELSA Locations and Arrangements
Connect this app
Please connect this app with the ELSA Educator app
To get started, open the ELSA Educator app
Tap on ‘Support’ in the main menu of the Educator app
Select ‘Connect to Children’s Apps’
You’ll be presented with a code containing 6 letters and numbers
Enter the code into the spaces below
Success!
The {0} app is connected to the Educator app. You can now add classes and children to the Educator app in the ‘Children’ tab. You will need to do this before children start using the app.
Not online
For the best experience, please check settings for an internet connection
Pairing failed
Please check the code and try again.
Enter the connect code containing 6 letters and numbers
Select class
Select a children's class to review children setup to play ELSA.
Loading data failed
Check your internet connection and try again
Are you sure?
This will log you out of the educators account requiring use of the connect code.
Children in this class

These are the children in this class that can play ELSA.
Select a child's profile picture to edit their details.
ELSA Support

Ask our support team at ELSA. We are ready to assist you with any STEM questions.
Call 1800 931 042 or email team@elsa.edu.au

If you would like to post a question to us click on the button below.
Children learn by collecting
Children can take photos of things around them to create unique patterns using content from their world.
Children learn by describing
Children can record their voice to describe patterns, sorting and other content they create.
Educators and children create stories
Children and educators work together to create stories and narrate them with photos from the Camera Roll.
Children learn by experiencing in their world
Children can explore the world around them using AR to experience spatial language in the Adventure Activity.
Children learn by describing
Children can record their voice to describe spatial language within the Mapping Activity.
Educators and children create stories
Children and educators can take photos of their experiences saving photos locally to the Camera Roll within the Adventure Activity.
Use this photo?
Would you like to use this photo to represent this child in ELSA?

Would you like to use this symbol to represent this child in ELSA?
Used for capturing images for educational use
Used for capturing audio for educational use
Selected class is missing

This class has been removed from the Educator app. To create a new class for children. Open the Educator app. Then tap on 'Children', add your classes and children's details. When you are ready, select another class for children to play ELSA.
No classes added

Make sure to add classes and children to ELSA within the Educator app. Open the Educator app. Then tap on 'Children', add your classes and children's details. When you are ready, press retry to see your classes.
No children have been added to class
Please add children to this class for ELSA within the Educator app. Tap on 'Children' in the menu to add your classes and children's details. When you are ready, press retry to see your classes.
Do not use photos of this child, permission has not been granted.
Before you can start using this app with your class, you will need to download the ELSA Educator app and register.
Download it here
I have already downloaded the Educator app and registered
Want to add new students? Please go to the Educator app and select 'Children' from the main menu.
Who can use this app?

This app was created by Early Learning STEM Australia (ELSA). It is currently only available to ELSA Program participants in preschool services and Foundation-year classes in Australia who have a paid subscription.

To register for the ELSA Program, visit the <u><link=SITE_URL>SPLAT-maths website</link></u>.
I'm an ELSA Program participant
Permissions Rejected
To enable camera roll usage in this activity, go to the app settings to grant permissions
To enable camera usage in this activity go to the app settings to grant permissions
